summary: Under the Air Force's KC-46 modernization program, commercial aircraft are being converted by Boeing into aerial refueling tankers. The program is one of the Air Force's highest acquisition priorities, and will replace a third of the aging fleet. We found that the program, now in its seventh year, is meeting its estimated acquisition cost. However, the program office projects that Boeing will not deliver the...
title: KC-46 Tanker Modernization: Program Cost Is Stable, but Schedule May Be Further Delayed
